item.title: Ziv Zaifman, Hugh Jackman, Michelle Williams - A Million Dreams
item.description:
For educational use. Optimized for GCEA ukulele. Key of G.
As heard in The Greatest Showman.
Also visit the version by Kris Gilbert: https://youtu.be/0_auBl2YMEQ
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The ukulele chord font is Chordette for Education, available at ukefarm.com.
Check out the Ukulele Video Play Along Podcast, where I talk about ukulele education and my own ukulele experiences. Available on Apple Podcasts and Google Play.
Are these ukulele resources valuable to you? If so, consider following my blog at ukestuff.info, and becoming a patron at www.patreon.com/cjrphd. There is a master list of all similar play along videos at ukestuff.info.

item.title: Jonathan Groff, Original Broadway Cast of Hamilton - You'll Be Back
item.description:
For educational use. Optimized for GCEA ukulele. Key of G.
From Hamilton.
The Copyright Holders just allowed publication of this video! Thank you!
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The ukulele chord font is Chordette for Education, available at ukefarm.com.

item.title: Loren Allred - Never Enough
item.description:
For educational use. Optimized for GCEA ukulele. Key of G. Down a half step from the original key.
As seen in “The Greatest Showman”
Try different strumming/plucking patterns, especially in the beginning! There is on surprise Cm chord!
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The ukulele chord font is Chordette for Education, available at ukefarm.com.
Are these ukulele resources valuable to you? If so, consider following my blog at ukestuff.info, and becoming a patron at www.patreon.com/cjrphd. There is a master list of all similar play along videos at ukestuff.info.

item.title: Zac Efron, Zendaya - Rewrite The Stars
item.description:
For educational use. Optimized for GCEA ukulele. Key of C. Raised a whole step from the original (Key of Bb).
From “The Greatest Showman”
My wife and I finally had the chance to see this a couple of weeks ago (bringing our boys) and we both loved the show. This duet works very well on the ukulele and in this key, isn’t so hard. In the areas with C and Csus4, you can also throw in some Cadd9 chords (0203) but the C to Csus4 is easy to do and sounds good.
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The ukulele chord font is Chordette for Education, available at ukefarm.com.
Are these ukulele resources valuable to you? If so, consider following my blog at ukestuff.info, and becoming a patron at www.patreon.com/cjrphd. There is a master list of all similar play along videos at ukestuff.info.

item.description:

All rights belong to John Debney, Joseph Trapanese, Justin Paul and Benj Pasek.
CHORDS USED: G, A, Bm, D
Strum On!

item.title: Monty Python - Look On The Bright Side Of Life (All Things Dull And Ugly) (Life Of Brian / Soundtrack Version)
item.description: WARNING!!! There is language in this version that might not be child-friendly. Chords: Am, D, G, Em, D7
